description: Citrix AVD Management is a process that includes the management and configuration of Citrix environments in Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD). While the post indicates concerns about FSLogix readiness, it highlights a broader need for tools that effectively manage Teams updates in conjunction with Windows Server and Intune. This management strategy aims to reduce WAN traffic significantly when handling updates. Utilizing Citrix AVD Management tools can help with maintaining performance while ensuring that user environments are appropriately managed in a hybrid cloud setup. For detailed procedural guidance and methodologies, refer to relevant Citrix documentation.
